item.title: Becoming a Digital Minimalist
item.description: Digital minimalism was never something I was aware of. When i was younger I always wanted to have the latest devices. I used to spend close to 9 hours a day on my phone, mostly TikTok of course. One day I stumpled upon a video from a YouTuber calles “Reysu” about how to properly setup a journaling notebook. I was immediately intrigued and wanted to give journaling a shot. Being the nerd I am, i started researching about pens and eventually found the “LAMY Safari” fountain pen.
